title: ArbescoDT - A new text face
content:
New release from DTP Types Limited

Arbesco - A text face for books magazines or newspapers.

[http://www.dtptypes.com/OTStandards/Arbesco.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015033735/http:/www.dtptypes.com/OTStandards/Arbesco.htm "http://www.dtptypes.com/OTStandards/Arbesco.htm")

[http://www.dtptypes.com/ArbescoSample.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015033735/http:/www.dtptypes.com/ArbescoSample.pdf "http://www.dtptypes.com/ArbescoSample.pdf")
author: malcolm

comments.content:
Reworking of TEFF's Lexicon1, actually -- (Enscede)  
Kinda nice indeed
Ah, glad to see that I wasn't the only one who thought so. Kind of a mix between Lexicon and MT Plantin if you ask me.
Sorry to dissent, but this family strikes me as completely unoriginal, too close to widely-available classics and therefore pointless to acquire, and, to top it off, over-priced!
